Class SystemSettings

java.lang.Object
entities.SystemSettings
public class SystemSettings extends Object
A class defining a System Settings object.

    top5Movies(List<Movie> mList)
    Function to display the menu where the customer can view the top 5 movies normally Customer able to view both top 5 movies by sales and ratings Excludes movies that have are not showing currently or in preview / have 0 overall rating score/ 0 profit earned.

    • updatePermissions

      public void updatePermissions()
      Read in and update the current permissions of system settings. To be called before further updating the system settings.

    • top5Movies

      public void top5Movies(List<Movie> mList)
      Function to display the menu where the customer can view the top 5 movies normally Customer able to view both top 5 movies by sales and ratings Excludes movies that have are not showing currently or in preview / have 0 overall rating score/ 0 profit earned.
      Parameters:
      mList - Existing List of movies

    • top5SalesOnly

      public void top5SalesOnly(List<Movie> mList)
      Function to display the menu where the customer can only view top 5 movies by sales Excludes movies that have are not showing currently or in preview / have 0 overall rating score/ 0 profit earned.
      Parameters:
      mList - Existing List of movies

    • top5RatingsOnly

      public void top5RatingsOnly(List<Movie> mList)
      Function to display the menu where the customer can only view top 5 movies by ratings Excludes movies that have are not showing currently or in preview / have 0 overall rating score/ 0 profit earned.
      Parameters:
      mList - Existing List of movies

    • viewNone

      public void viewNone()
      Function to display the menu where customer cannot view both top 5 movies by sales and ratings. A placeholder message will be displayed instead.
